author: parithosh
content: afaik otterscan is also a great explorer, it comes packaged with the Erigon client I think. I've only used it sparingly, so I've no idea of how it compares to etherescan, etc.

author: lekevicius
content:
Pretty decent, actually. The transaction viewer seems to be good, and it looks to have contract decoding.

From my additional research it seems that technically both Blockscout and Otterscan are very good bases, but both could benefit from UX/UI improvements.
Design and open-source software has very complicated relationship, but would be good to address this over the next 3-5 years, fund alternatives and encourage competition between blockchain explorers.

Etherscan is great, but people shouldn't think that it is "Ethereum", and just today I met a less technical person who actually said they submitted an "Etherscan transaction"...
